bibl.title: Ptolemaic Soldiers under the Romans. A Note on the Dedication of an Ilarches (ZPE 87, 1991, 53-55).
bibl.note: Disagrees with the interpretation proposed by: Étienne BERNAND, Dédicace d'un ilarque (18 av. J.-C.), ZPE 87 (1991) pp. 53-55 et pl. II a. - The inscription commemorates a dedication made by former Ptolemaic cavalrymen who as military settlers lived in the same place and formed an (mainly cultic) association.
LAJTAR Adam, Ptolemaic Soldiers under the Romans. A Note on the Dedication of an Ilarches (ZPE 87, 1991, 53-55).
